info.author: OpenStack
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: Apache Software License
info.description:
===========================
Tempest Integration of Nova
===========================

This project defines a Tempest plugin containing out of tree tests used to
verify the functionality of a Nova installation. The plugin will automatically
load these tests into Tempest.

Developers
----------
For more information on Nova, refer to:
http://docs.openstack.org/developer/nova

For more information on tempest plugins, refer to:
http://docs.openstack.org/developer/tempest/plugin.html#using-plugins

Bugs
----
Please report bugs to: http://bugs.launchpad.net/nova
